job_title: Digital Marketing Apprentice Specialization Track: Strategist/Media Planner/Content Marketing
job_description:
Role:

1. You will embark on a comprehensive, hands-on learning journey in digital marketing and growth, with an initial assessment determining your specialization in either Digital Strategy, Digital Media Planning, or Content Marketing.
2. This apprenticeship is specifically designed for fresh graduates to cultivate your skills deeply within an assigned track, guiding you to become a proficient digital marketing professional contributing to engaging campaigns and strategic growth initiatives.
3. You will be closely mentored, learning industry best practices in digital strategy, media optimization, and content creation within a dynamic digital consulting environment, focusing on your specific area of expertise.

Responsibilities:
1. Following an initial assessment, actively learn and assist in conducting in-depth research on digital trends, market shifts, competitor activities, and target audiences within your assigned specialization.
2. Contribute to the analysis of customer and user data, campaign performance, and digital channel effectiveness, helping to identify insights and opportunities for growth.
3. Support the development and execution of strategic blueprints, media plans, and engaging content (e.g., articles, blogs, social media, email marketing) relevant to your track.
4. Learn to optimize digital initiatives by tracking performance, identifying areas for improvement, and assisting with adjustments to achieve business objectives.
5. Participate in brainstorming sessions with cross-functional teams (e.g., Creative, Account Management, other Strategists/Media Planners/Content Creators) to develop innovative ideas and campaign concepts.
6. Assist in preparing comprehensive reports and presentations on digital strategy, media performance, or content effectiveness for internal review and client communication.
7. Proactively research and stay updated with the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and platforms, actively contributing to a learning-oriented and innovative team environment.

Qualifications:
1. Educational Background: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, Journalism, Foreign Language, Information Technology, or a closely related field.
2. Professional Experience: This program is specifically designed for fresh graduates with no prior full-time professional experience. Strong academic performance, participation in relevant coursework, and prior internships, personal blogs, or extracurricular activities demonstrating an interest in digital marketing, social media, or data analysis are highly essential.
3. Technical/Hard Skills: Foundational understanding of digital marketing concepts, various digital platforms (social media, websites, blogs), and basic data analysis using spreadsheet tools. 4. 4. 4. Good writing skills and strong command of grammar in both English and Bahasa Indonesia. Familiarity with major social media platforms and an eagerness to learn about online advertising platforms (e.g., Google Ads, Meta Ads).
5. Soft Skills: Excellent communication skills (written and verbal). Strong analytical and conceptual thinking abilities. Highly organized, detail-oriented, proactive, curious, and eager to learn in a fast-paced environment. Passionate about digital marketing, technology, and consumer behavior.
5. Bonus Points: Basic familiarity with SEO concepts, content management systems, or digital analytics platforms. Any hands-on experience managing personal or organizational social media accounts. Experience with graphic design tools (e.g., Canva).

This apprentice provides one slot under the role of Digital Marketing Executive Apprentice, but each candidate will be assigned to a specific specialization (Digital Strategist Apprentice, Digital Media Planner Apprentice, or Content Marketing Apprentice) based on skills, interest, and initial assessment. You are not expected to handle all specializations at once.
